Description: Up for sale is a Beautiful Gibson ES-339 Guitar in Excellent condition ready to play. The guitar has been rarely played and kept securely in its case in a climate controlled enviroment when not. It has been extremely well cared for never gigged, and has never left the house. This model is light and very versatile with an awesome warm tone that semi hollows provide. I have checked all functionality prior to listing. The guitar is set up nicely with great intonation, low action and sounds awesome. I may be selling a couple more guitars in the next few months as I need to thin the collection a bit more. Besides, this guitar needs to be played and appreciated for its playability and beauty. I have sold many of my guitars here on EBay with nothing less than an excellent rating as I take pride in what I list. If there are any questions please contact me and I will get back with you as soon as possible with an answer. The Guitar will be packed and shipped Immediately with extreme care. Ships to continental US only! Thanks for looking! FEATURES F-hole emblem engraved truss rod cover: The iconic symbol of the Gibson ES line is now the hallmark of Gibson Memphis. Redesigned neck dimensions: Added thickness to Peghead transition provides greater strength and stability. Historic truss rod: Superior adjustability due to the Teflon coating, larger diameter rod, original brass anchor and larger washer. Rolled neck binding: Binding is rounded off to comfortably fit the contours of the player's hand. Low profile frets: Lower fret height provides smooth playability and accurate intonation. New finish colors: New variations on your favorite vintage color schemes as well as all new, eye catching colors. Locking stop bar tailpiece: Solid connection from the stop bar to the body of the guitar increases resonance and sustain all while making string changes simpler. Body Body shape: Double cutaway Body type: Semi-hollow or chambered body Body material: Laminated Top wood: Maple 3-ply Body wood: Maple 3-ply Body finish: Gloss Orientation: Right handed Neck Neck shape: C traditional Neck wood: Maple Joint: Set-in Scale length: 24.75" Truss rod: Historic Neck finish: Gloss Fretboard Material: Torrified maple Radius: 12" Fret size: Medium Number of frets: 22 Inlays: Dot Nut width: 1.675" (42.5mm) Pickups Configuration: HH Neck: '57 Classic Middle: Not applicable Bridge: Super '57 Classic Brand: Gibson Active or passive: Passive Series or parallel: Series Piezo: No Active EQ: No Special electronics: None Controls Control layout: Master volume, tone Pickup switch: 3-way Coil tap or split: No Kill switch: No Hardware Bridge type: Fixed Bridge design: TonePros AVR2 Tailpiece: Stopbar Tuning machines: Grover Color: Nickel Other Number of strings: 6-string Special features: Pickups Case: Hardshell case Country of origin: United States
Title: 2015 Gibson ES-339 Studio Guitar w OHSC and COA. Semi Hollow, Beautiful Cond.
